oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Springfield rifle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This U.S. M1903 A3 Springfield rifle has a straight grip walnut stock and parkerized metal finish. The nose cap bolt is missing. The reciever ring is marked " U.S./REMINGTON/MODEL 1903-A3/4110761." This is an example of the post war modifications that were made to improve the M1903 Springfield rifle. The rifle has been de-milled by welding the bolt in the closed position.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
